job_history.work_description: Teach movement and principles of yoga. Guide students through a variety of postures. Promote physical, mental and spiritual wellness. Demonstrate relaxation and breathing techniques.

Manage a classroom of 20-27 students daily. Plan and implement lessons based on common core standards. Utilize a variety of instructional strategies to incorporate all student learning styles and differentiate lessons accordingly. Maintain and utilize student data in a variety of programs to assess learning, and modify lessons to create meaningful, authentic education. Collaborate with team members and staff to create and implement curriculum based on common core standards. Communicate student progress to parents/guardians.
Developed and facilitated diversified fitness programs campus wide. Wrote monthly fitness and nutrition newsletter. Instructed a variety of daily fitness classes.

Developed and facilitated fun, safe and effective group exercise programs for senior citizens off site to stimulate mind and body. Motivated students to strive for physical wellness while accommodating diverse fitness levels and special needs.

skills.name: Teaching
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience teaching students of various age groups, including first-grade students and senior citizens, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience managing a classroom of students and coordinating with team members to create and implement curriculum, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience communicating with parents/guardians about student progress, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Curriculum Development
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and implementing lessons based on common core standards, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Classroom Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing a classroom of students, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Yoga Instruction
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience teaching yoga and guiding students through various postures, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Fitness Instruction
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and facilitating fitness programs for various age groups, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Program Development
skills.explanation: Has experience developing and facilitating diversified fitness programs, suggesting solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
